name: get_5_day_3_hour_forecast_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool vision_weather_map.
Tool description: Obtain weather forecast and forecast for diverse cities.
API description: The 5-day forecast is available in any location or city. It contains weather data every 3 hours. The forecast is available in JSON or XML format.

q.description: The location query in the format "{city name},{country code}". The city name and country code should be divided by a comma, and the country code should follow ISO 3166 standards. Defaults to 'dallas,us'.
